item.title:
Several mammal species live in cold-water environments thanks to adaptations like blubber and large size. A notable exception is the sea otter‚Äîso how does it stay warm?
A 2021 Science study found an answer: skeletal muscle thermogenesis. https://t.co/I0PiT5Ry34 #WorldOtterDay https://t.co/LDCAf2GLsX

item.title: Life has been evolving for over 3 billion years, and brains appeared only 0.5 billion years ago. If life were a TV series, the brain would be a new character that's introduced in season 7 and quickly dominates the show to the dismay of older fans.
